analysis.description:
BitSTDView (/unique_chucks/13/0x6fc22d1f6852af2bcea6cb749033ccb6b4d3177a.sol#375-567) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/13/0x6fc22d1f6852af2bcea6cb749033ccb6b4d3177a.sol#480-482)

BitSTDLogic.migration (/unique_chucks/13/0x6fc22d1f6852af2bcea6cb749033ccb6b4d3177a.sol#174-199) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- data.balanceOf(receiver) == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x6fc22d1f6852af2bcea6cb749033ccb6b4d3177a.sol:
	Contract BitSTDView has payable functions:
	 - buy (/unique_chucks/13/0x6fc22d1f6852af2bcea6cb749033ccb6b4d3177a.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
